Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Security fixes and UX improvements

SECURITY FIXES (CRITICAL):
- Fix API token hardcoded vulnerability in logs endpoint
- Remove rehypeRaw plugin to prevent XSS attacks via HTML injection
- Add path traversal protection in file download handler
- Disable debug endpoints in production environment
- Add comprehensive security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options)

FEATURES & UX:
- Add compact horizontal layout for selected product on desktop
- Implement recent searches in localStorage with autocomplete
- Add variant qualifiers display in search suggestions (parametric)
- Fix autocomplete click event timing issue
- Add pagination label translations (6 languages)
- Create API route for variant config to avoid CORS

CONFIGURATION:
- Add ADMIN_API_TOKEN environment variable requirement
- Configure CSP to allow backend API and images
- Add security headers for production deployment
